title: Cannot connect to server
body: I started a ranked match this morning and about two minutes into the match my ping spiked to 500ms and said reconnecting to about a minute and a half. Then I got a little pop up saying that I cannot connect to servers, please check internet connection and try again (something very close to that). I have restarted my internet and even my computer and nothing is letting me get back into my match. I really don't want to lose LP or get a leaver buster because of this. RIOT please help me out on this.

replies.body: There may have been some hiccups with the current maintenance per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Are you still having these issues?
